statements: SELECT * FROM leadership_decisions WHERE leader_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT leader_name, decision_date FROM leadership_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT decision_id, leader_name, decision_description FROM leadership_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_decisions FROM leadership_decisions;
SELECT * FROM leadership_decisions WHERE decision_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM leadership_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC, leader_name ASC
SELECT leader_name, COUNT(decision_id) FROM leadership_decisions GROUP BY leader_name HAVING COUNT(decision_id) > 2
SELECT decision_id, leader_name, decision_description FROM leadership_decisions WHERE leader_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM leadership_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' AND decision_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT leader_name, MAX(decision_date) FROM leadership_decisions GROUP BY leader_name ORDER BY MAX(decision_date) DESC
SELECT * FROM decision_making_data WHERE decision_maker = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, decision_description FROM decision_making_data WHERE decision_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT decision_maker, COUNT(*) AS decision_count FROM decision_making_data GROUP BY decision_maker;
SELECT evaluation_result, reviewer FROM evaluation_data ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM evaluation_data WHERE decision_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM decision_making_data WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_maker DESC;
SELECT evaluation_result, evaluation_date, reviewer FROM evaluation_data WHERE reviewer = 'Alice' ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT decision_description FROM decision_making_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT decision_maker, COUNT(*) AS total_decisions FROM decision_making_data GROUP BY decision_maker HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT decision_description, evaluation_result FROM decision_making_data JOIN evaluation_data ON decision_making_data.id = evaluation_data.decision_id WHERE evaluation_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM leaders_decision ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT leader_name, decision_description FROM leaders_decision WHERE leader_name='John Doe';
SELECT leader_name, COUNT(*) AS decision_count FROM leaders_decision GROUP BY leader_name;
SELECT evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM leadership_evaluation WHERE evaluation_score > 4 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM learning_outcomes ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM leaders_decision WHERE leader_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT leader_name, decision_description FROM leaders_decision WHERE decision_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY decision_description ASC;
SELECT evaluator_name, evaluation_score FROM leadership_evaluation WHERE evaluation_score > 4.5 ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT leader_id, evaluator_name, feedback FROM leadership_evaluation JOIN learning_outcomes ON leadership_evaluation.id = learning_outcomes.evaluation_id;
SELECT leader_name, evaluator_name, evaluation_score FROM leaders_decision JOIN leadership_evaluation ON leaders_decision.id = leadership_evaluation.leader_id;
SELECT * FROM DecisionMakers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, position FROM DecisionMakers WHERE id = 3
SELECT decision_description FROM Decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT evaluation_date, evaluator FROM Evaluation WHERE evaluator LIKE '%John%'
SELECT learning_description FROM Learning WHERE learner = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM DecisionMakers;
SELECT name, position, decision_date FROM DecisionMakers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT D.decision_date, E.evaluator, L.learner FROM Decisions D JOIN Evaluation E ON D.id = E.decision_id JOIN Learning L ON E.id = L.evaluation_id;

SELECT DM.name AS DecisionMaker, D.decision_date, E.evaluation_description AS EvaluationDescription, L.learning_description AS LearningDescription FROM DecisionMakers DM JOIN Decisions D ON DM.id = D.decision_maker_id JOIN Evaluation E ON D.id = E.decision_id JOIN Learning L ON E.id = L.evaluation_id WHERE DM.position = 'Manager';
SELECT COUNT(DM.id) AS TotalDecisionMakers, COUNT(D.id) AS TotalDecisions FROM DecisionMakers DM JOIN Decisions D ON DM.id = D.decision_maker_id;
SELECT * FROM leadership_decisions;
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, decision_description FROM leadership_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT leader_name, leadership_role FROM leaders WHERE leadership_role = 'CEO';
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT review_id, decision_id, reviewer_id, review_comments FROM decisions_review WHERE review_comments IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM leadership_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT leader_name, leadership_role FROM leaders WHERE leadership_role = 'CEO';
SELECT department_name, leader_name FROM departments d JOIN leaders l ON d.department_head = l.leader_id;
SELECT decision_description, review_comments FROM leadership_decisions ld JOIN decisions_review dr ON ld.decision_id = dr.decision_id;
SELECT decision_description, recommended_action FROM leadership_decisions ld JOIN recommendation r ON ld.decision_id = r.decision_id ORDER BY ld.decision_date DESC;
